snippet: The fourth Buffett Cup will be played from Monday to Thursday in Omaha, the hometown of Warren Buffett, the tournament’s namesake.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on a deal played at the 2010 Buffet Cup.
lead_paragraph: The fourth Buffett Cup will be played from Monday to Thursday in Omaha, the hometown of Warren Buffett, the tournament’s namesake.

headline.seo: The Buffett Cup in Bridge to be Played in Omaha
headline.main: Buffett Cup in Bridge to be Played in Omaha
